label: QuantityAnalysis
comment: The analytic breakdown of a quantity to include its supporting information, such as a complex quantity that consists of multiple pieces of information that together constitute a single quantity.

datatypeProperties.comment: The actual quantity for this work item quantity analysis.

The percentage of a total quantity that the actual quantity of this work item quantity analysis represents. Definition corrected. Industry context value changed from "Construction" to "In All Contexts".
A code specifying an alternative classification value for this work item quantity analysis.
The code specifying the contractual language for this work item quantity analysis.
The textual description of this work item quantity analysis.
The unique identifier for this work item quantity analysis.
A code specifying a primary classification value for this work item quantity analysis.
The code specifying the status of this work item quantity analysis, such as partial, approved, not approved. Deprecated - Use ASBIE to Recorded Status instead.
The code specifying the type of work item quantity analysis.

objectProperties.comment: A work item dimension of the actual quantity in this work item quantity analysis.
A quantity analysis breakdown of this work item quantity analysis.
A changed recorded status for this work item quantity analysis.

referencedBy.comment: A quantity analysis breakdown of this work item quantity analysis.
An analysis of the total quantity for this basic work item.
